_description: Aircraft note definitions for Baltic Approaches module. Notes are organized by nation - each nation has its own A-M sequence.

A.description: Use lower bomb point load for Deep Strike and Naval Strike raids.

B.description: May Spot Jam [19.34] two radars at the same time.

D.description: If tasked with Escort Jamming [8.341] may carry HARMs [17.54] and attack naval or land radar targets.

G.description: May do Max Turns as Free Turns [8.32]

H.description: AIM-7 depletion is {6} if tasked with Bombing, SEAD, Recon, or Rescue Support.

I.description: Flights may carry AIM-7 and AIM-54 RHM at the same time.

J.description: If tasked with Maritime Patrol, may carry Harpoon and attack naval targets.

K.description: If tasked with Recon, missile load is AIM-9L {6}, AIM-7M {6}

L.description: AAX-1 sensor. Automatic visual ID at end of Detection Phase of one detected enemy flight in forward arc, line of sight, and same altitude at 1-8 hex range. Day only

M.description: Large Aircraft [19.22] (see [6.40] for climbing limitations) and Poor SAM Defense [15.32].

A.description: AIM-9 depletion is {6} if tasked with Bombing, SEAD, Recon, or Rescue Support.

B.description: Large Aircraft [19.22] (see [6.40] for climbing limitations) and Poor SAM Defense [15.32]

C.description: Use lower bomb point load for Deep Strike and Naval Strike raids.

D.description: Internal bay. May only carry regular bombs in the bay. Use clean ratings while laden.

E.description: AN/AVQ-23E Pave Spike designator pod. May laser-designate for [17.69] for other flights.

F.description: AIM-9 not allowed if tasked with Bombing, Naval Strike, SEAD, or Rescue Support.

H.description: No AIM-9 if tasked with Bombing or SEAD.

J.description: May do Max Turns as Free Turns [6.32].

A.description: Large Aircraft [19.22] (see [6.40] for climbing limitations) and Poor SAM Defense [15.32]; May not carry Rockets, CBU, or Anti-Runway ordnance.

B.description: Use lower bomb point load for Deep Strike and Naval Strike Raids.

C.description: SSM Missile data relay [35.94], maximum ranges: Deck 8 Hexes, Low+ 36 Hexes.

D.description: SSM Missile data relay [35.94], maximum ranges: Deck 8 Hexes, Low+ 24 Hexes.

F.description: Kh-25MP only allowed if tasked with SEAD. May swap regular bombs for KMGU [17.66].

H.description: Semi-conformal center station. May load AS-4(1) instead of AS-4(2) and use clean ratings.

A.description: No IRM / RHM if tasked with Bombing/SEAD/Chaff Laying.

B.description: Roll to determine IRM load for each flight: 1-6 R-13M, 6-10 R-60.

C.description: Use lower bomb point load for Deep Strike and Naval Strike raids.

D.description: May carry Chaff [17.68] if tasked with Chaff Laying.

E.description: Only Bombs, AT GBU, or Rocket Pods allowed.

F.description: Roll for 23mm Gun {4} Pod for each flight: 1-6 Pod, 7-10 No Pod.

H.description: SSM missile data relay [35.94], max range at Deck: 8 Hexes, Low+ 25 Hexes.

I.description: Short horn surface search radar. Stats: Column D / LD [12], 10+: -2, all arcs.

K.description: May swap regular bombs for KMGU [17.66].

A.description: No AIM-4 or AIM-9 if tasked with Bombing or SEAD.

B.description: Only ordnance allowed are Rocket Pods [17.63]

C.description: AIM-9 Depletion {6} and no RHM if tasked with Bombing.

E.description: Roll to determine AIM-9 for each flight: 1-6 AIM-9P, 7-10 AIM-9L.

G.description: May only place Standoff Jamming arc in forward or rear arcs, not beams.

H.description: No AT or AP CBU [17.61] allowed regardless of task.
